name: NEW LIFE FOUNDATION
briefDescription: N.L.F was established on 3rd April, 2008 with a numerous objectives mainly to eradicate the disease of addiction/alcoholism from the society. At the begining, there were various obstacles  to the smooth functioning of N.L.F such as financial problem, administrative problem and other various problem such as various pressure created by various groups. But noble cause can not be suppressed by misdeeds, beside all hindrances N.L.F continued it’s journey towards it’s ultimate goal.
